abstract.text: Creates an audio recorder with settings.

inlineContent.text: The file system location to record to.
The audio settings to use for the recording.

The system supports additional configuration options based on your selected audio format. See

abstract.text: Play, record, and process audio; configure your app’s system audio behavior.
An object that records audio data to a file.
Creates an audio recorder with an audio format.
Creates an audio recorder with settings.
An integer value that represents the format of the audio data.
An integer value that represents the number of channels.
A floating point value that represents the sample rate, in hertz.
The constants that define the audio encoder settings for the audio recorder class.
The audio settings that apply to linear PCM audio formats.
A key that specifies Apple’s implementation of the IMA 4:1 ADPCM codec, and uses no flags.
A key that specifies the Apple Lossless codec, and uses flags to indicate the bit depth of the source material.
A key that specifies the linear PCM codec, and uses the standard flags.
A key that specifies the MPEG-4 AAC Low Complexity codec, and uses no flags.
A key that specifies the μ-Law 2:1 codec, and uses no flags.
A key that specifies the internet Low Bitrate Codec (iLBC) narrow band speech codec, and uses no flags.
Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.
Defines the `id` of a null instance.
Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.
A value that identifies the location of a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.

inlineContent.text: The file system location to record to.
The audio settings to use for the recording.
On input, a pointer to an error object. If an error occurs, the framework sets the pointer to an
object that describes the error. If you don’t want error information, pass in
